item.text: Now after these things had happened, during the reign of King Artaxerxes of Persia, Ezra came up from Babylon. Ezra was the son of Seraiah, who was the son of Azariah, who was the son of Hilkiah,

who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07967" class="">Shallum</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0285" class="">Ahitub</st>,

who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0568" class="">Amariah</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05838" class="">Azariah</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04812" class="">Meraioth</st>,

who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02228" class="">Zerahiah</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05813" class="">Uzzi</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01231" class="">Bukki</st>,

who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="050" class="">Abishua</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06372" class="">Phinehas</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0499" class="">Eleazar</st>, who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">chief</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.

This Ezra is the one who came up from Babylon. He was a scribe who was skilled in the law of Moses which the Lord God of Israel had given. The king supplied him with everything he requested, for the hand of the Lord his God was on him.

In the <st data-num="07651" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="0783" class="">Artaxerxes</st>, Ezra <st data-num="05927" class="">brought up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> some of the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> and <st data-num="04480" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st>, the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st>, the <st data-num="07891" class="">attendants</st>, the <st data-num="07778" class="">gatekeepers</st>, and the <st data-num="05411" class="">temple servants</st>.

He <st data-num="0935" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> in the <st data-num="02549" class="">fifth</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> of the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.

On the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> day of the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="03245" class="">determined</st> to make<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04609" class="">ascent</st> from <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>, and on the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> day of the <st data-num="02549" class="">fifth</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st> he <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="2" /> for the <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> of his <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> him.
Now Ezra had dedicated himself to the study of the law of the Lord, to its observance, and to teaching its statutes and judgments in Israel.
What follows is a copy of the letter that King Artaxerxes gave to Ezra the priestly scribe. Ezra was a scribe in matters pertaining to the commandments of the Lord and his statutes over Israel:
“Artaxerxes, king of kings, to Ezra the priest, a scribe of the law of the God of heaven:

I <st data-num="04481" class="">have now</st> <st data-num="07761" class="">issued</st> a <st data-num="02942" class="">decree</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03606" class="">anyone</st> in my <st data-num="04437" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05972" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03479" class="">Israel</st>—even the <st data-num="03549" class="">priests</st> and <st data-num="03879" class="">Levites</st>—who <st data-num="05069" class="">wishes</st> to <st data-num="01946" class="">do so</st> may <st data-num="01946" class="">go up</st> <st data-num="05974" class="">with</st> you to <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="2" />

You are <st data-num="07972" class="">authorized</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04481 06925">by</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> and his <st data-num="07655" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03272" class="">advisers</st> to <st data-num="01240" class="">inquire</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="03061" class="">Judah</st> and <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st>, according to the <st data-num="01882" class="">law</st> of your <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">which</st> is in your <st data-num="03028" class="">possession</st>,<n id="2" />

and to <st data-num="02987" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">which</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> and his <st data-num="03272" class="">advisers</st> have <st data-num="05069" class="">freely contributed</st> to the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="03479" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="01768" class="">who</st> <st data-num="04907" class="">resides</st> in <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st>,

along with <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> you may <st data-num="07912" class="">collect</st><n id="1" /> throughout <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04083" class="">province</st> of <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="05974" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="05069 05069">contributions</st> of the <st data-num="05972" class="">people</st> and the <st data-num="03549" class="">priests</st> for the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of their <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">which</st> is in <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st>.

With <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03702" class="">money</st> you <st data-num="03606 06903 01836">should</st> <st data-num="0629" class="">be sure to</st> <st data-num="07066" class="">purchase</st> <st data-num="08450" class="">bulls</st>, <st data-num="01798" class="">rams</st>, and <st data-num="0563" class="">lambs</st>, along with the appropriate<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04504" class="">meal offerings</st> and <st data-num="05261" class="">libations</st>. You should <st data-num="07127" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="01994" class="">them</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04056" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of your <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">which</st> is in <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st>.

You may <st data-num="05648" class="">do</st> <st data-num="04101 01768">whatever</st> <st data-num="03191 05648">seems appropriate</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">to</st> you and your <st data-num="0252" class="">colleagues</st><n id="1" /> with the <st data-num="07606" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st> and the <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st>, in keeping with the <st data-num="07470" class="">will</st> of your <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="08000" class="">Deliver</st> <st data-num="06925" class="">to</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="03390" class="">Jerusalem</st> the <st data-num="03984" class="">vessels</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> are <st data-num="03052" class="">given</st> to you for the <st data-num="06402" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of your <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st>.
The rest of the needs for the temple of your God that you may have to supply, you may do so from the royal treasury.
“I, King Artaxerxes, hereby issue orders to all the treasurers of Trans-Euphrates that you precisely execute all that Ezra the priestly scribe of the law of the God of heaven may request of you—

<st data-num="05705" class="">up to</st> <st data-num="03969" class="">100</st> <st data-num="03604" class="">talents</st> of <st data-num="03702" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="03969" class="">100</st> <st data-num="03734" class="">cors</st> of <st data-num="02591" class="">wheat</st>, <st data-num="03969" class="">100</st> <st data-num="01325" class="">baths</st> of <st data-num="02562" class="">wine</st>, <st data-num="03969" class="">100</st> <st data-num="01325" class="">baths</st> of <st data-num="04887" class="">olive oil</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01768 03809 03792">unlimited</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04416" class="">salt</st>.

<st data-num="03606" class="">Everything</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="04481 02941">has required</st> should be <st data-num="0149" class="">precisely</st> <st data-num="05648" class="">done</st> for the <st data-num="01005" class="">temple</st> of the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st>. <st data-num="01768 04101">Why</st> should there <st data-num="01934" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07109" class="">wrath</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05922" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="04437" class="">empire</st> of the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> and his <st data-num="01123" class="">sons</st>?

Furthermore, be aware of the fact that you have no authority to impose tax, tribute, or toll on any of the priests, the Levites, the musicians, the doorkeepers, the temple servants, or the attendants at the temple of this God.

“Now you, Ezra, in keeping with the wisdom of your God which you possess, appoint judges and court officials who can arbitrate cases on behalf of all the people who are in Trans-Euphrates who know the laws of your God. Those who do not know this law should be taught.

Everyone who does not observe both the law of your God and the law of the king will be completely liable to the appropriate penalty, whether it is death or banishment or confiscation of property or detainment in prison.”
Blessed be the Lord God of our fathers, who so moved in the heart of the king to so honor the temple of the Lord which is in Jerusalem!

He has also conferred his favor on me before the king, his advisers, and all the influential leaders of the king. I gained strength as the hand of the Lord my God was on me, and I gathered leaders from Israel to go up with me.
